overview:
Senior financial executive with 20 years of experience. Numerous accomplishments at public companies as CFO, Treasurer, and Director of Finance & Operations. Effective in private and early-stage organizations. Completed several successful acquisition and integration projects. Responsible for broad range of functions including, information technology, risk management, purchasing, human resources and operations. Key strategic partner for Business Units and CEO. Hands-on manager, when required, with collaborative leadership style.

Specialties Financial planning, analysis and budgeting; global cash management and banking; internal controls and Sarbanes-Oxley testing; investor relations and stock administration; SEC reporting (certifying officer); credit review and collections; cost reduction and operations improvement; risk management and information systems.
